doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 126[Air Date: 11/27/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 126[Air Date: 11/27/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Interview with Nancy Roth, Executive Director, Gay Rights National Lobby, discussing anti-discrimination in immigration policyCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club2. City status granted to West Hollywood, California; city council is formed3. Anti-gay Texas Senator Phil [Graham] wins election4. Gay Rights bill passed in Houston, Texas, but may be overturnedCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp5. Interview with David Bender, campaigner, discussing the win of Massachusetts' openly gay Senator Gary StuddsCOMMERCIAL: New York Gay Film Festival6. National Gay Task Force meetingCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper7. Interview with Pastor Karen Zeigler, Metropolitan Community Church, discusses meeting with National Council of ChurchesCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"8. First census of a gay community, San FranciscoCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals9. Carol Bellamy, announcement of upcoming appearanceCOMMERCIAL: Arcos Blancos, San Juan, Puerto Rico10. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Christopher Collins, attorney, discusses the start of Community Health ProjectCOMMERCIAL: "Badlands," a NYC gay bar11. Sports Report/ closing
The Right Stuff:1. Media Report/ Current EventsCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club2. Terry Miller interviews Quentin Crisp, author/ performerCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"3. Quentin Crisp interview continuedCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity for disabled gays and lesbians4. Preview of upcoming gay motion picture, "Whispers"COMMERCIAL: Rio Adventure, Orpheo travel agency5. Interview with Ron Gould, producer of gay film "Whispers"/ closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 126[Air Date: 11/27/1984]: November 1984
